https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dqoshZPLNsXlC1qtz5n34raUyrE.jpg Anthony and his partner move into a loft in the now gentrified Cabrini-Green. After a chance encounter with an old-timer exposes Anthony to the true story behind Candyman, he unknowingly opens a door to a complex past that unravels his own sanity and unleashes a terrifying wave of violence. Candyman
